entry.title: PHP二维数组根据键值合并
entry.content: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324//如果键a和b的值相同就合并，然后键c的值相加<?php$ar = array( array( 'a' => 1, 'b' => 1, 'c' => 20 ,'d'=>'qsgw'), array( 'a' => 2, 'b' => 2, 'c' => 10 ,'d'=>'wqsdf'), array( 'a' => 3, 'b' => 1, 'c' => 20 ,'d'=>'qwe'), array( 'a' => 1, 'b' => 1, 'c' => 20 ,'d'=>'qsgw'), array( 'a' => 2, 'b' => 2, 'c' => 10 ,'d'=>'wqsdf'), array( 'a' => 3, 'b' => 1, 'c' => 20 ,'d'=>'qwe'),);$tmpArray = [];foreach ($ar as $row) { $key = $row['a'].'_'.$row['b']; if (array_key_exists($key, $tmpArray)) { if (is_array($tmpArray[$key]['c'])) { $tmpArray[$key]['c'][] = $row['c']; } else { $tmpArray[$key]['c'] = $tmpArray[$key]['c'] + $row['c']; } } else { $tmpArray[$key] = $row; }}var_dump($tmpArray); 运行结果： 如果想重置键值可以： 1$tmpArray = array_values($tmpArray); 结果为：
